value.title: Using OR conditions between slicers in DAX
value.excerpt: How to implement a logical OR condition between two slicers of a Power BI report, or of a PivotTable in Excel. By default, when relying on more than one slicer they are considered in an AND condition. This video+article explains how to change this behavior using DAX.  Article and sample download: https://sql.bi/66373?aff=yt
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/l5JX3G5Ntzk" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI
value.excerpt: Implement advanced data visualization techniques by using Power BI

topItems.title: Understand advanced data visualization concepts
topItems.excerpt: Create cohesive, inclusive, and efficient Power BI reports to effectively communicate results.

topItems.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
topItems.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

topItems.title: Create paginated reports
topItems.excerpt: Paginated reports allow report developers to create Power BI artifacts that have tightly controlled rendering requirements. Paginated reports are ideal for creating sales invoices, receipts, purchase orders, and tabular data. This module will teach you how to create reports, add parameters, and work with tables and charts in paginated reports.

value.title: Introduction to data analytics on Azure
value.excerpt: Introduction to data analytics on Azure

topItems.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
topItems.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

topItems.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
topItems.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

topItems.title: Explore data analytics at scale
topItems.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Add measures to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn how to work with implicit and explicit measures. You'll start by creating simple measures, which summarize a single column or table. Then, you'll create more complex measures based on other measures in the model. Additionally, you'll learn about the similarities of, and differences between, a calculated column and a measure.

value.title: Use DAX iterator functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn about what the family of iterator functions can do and how to use them in your DAX calculations. Calculations will include custom summarizations, ranking, and concatenation.

value.title: Modify DAX filter context in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to describe filter context, which is used to evaluate measure formulas. You'll then learn why some calculations need to modify filter context and that it can be achieved by using the CALCULATE function. Additionally, you'll learn how to configure the CALCULATE function with filters and filter modifiers.

value.title: Use DAX time intelligence functions in Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll learn the meaning of time intelligence and how to add time intelligence DAX calculations to your model. These calculations will include year-to-date (YTD), year-over-year (YoY) growth, and others.

value.title: Explore Azure data services for modern analytics
value.excerpt: Understand analytics solutions in the Azure data ecosystem. Explore the architecture of a scalable analytics solution to meet business needs.

value.title: Explore data analytics at scale
value.excerpt: Describe data analytics at scale and understand the roles of a data team. Learn about the responsibilities of an enterprise data analyst and what tools are available to build scalable solutions.

value.title: Transcend data analysis together with Power BI and Excel
value.excerpt: This module introduces potential ways that people can use Excel and Power BI together. Power BI is a great tool for telling a story through visuals; occasionally, it's beneficial to use Excel for analysis. Excel can make a connection to a Power BI dataset, enabling you to analyze the data by using PivotTables.

value.title: Monitor data in real-time with Power BI
value.excerpt: Describe real-time analytics in Power BI using automatic page refresh, real-time dashboards, and auto-refresh in paginated reports.

value.title: Create and manage a Power BI deployment pipeline
value.excerpt: The deployment pipelines tool enables Power BI creators to manage the development lifecycle of organizational content.

value.title: Configure Power BI report filters
value.excerpt: Report filtering is a complex topic because many techniques are available for filtering a Microsoft Power BI report. However, with complexity comes control, allowing you to design reports that meet requirements and expectations.

value.title: Understand concepts of data analytics
value.excerpt: Explore key concepts of data analytics, including types of analytics, data, and storage. Explore the analytics process and tools used to discover insights.

value.title: Cumulative Distribution Plot in Power BI
value.excerpt: Learn how to create cumulative distribution plot which is a great alternative to a histogram. Histogram can lead to binning bias that will provide different distribution of the same data.

value.excerpt: Learn how to incorporate DAX Table functions in Power BI with real world scenarios. Also learn how to quickly add these functions in to dynamic calculations in DAX.
